item.description:
Reiki III

Friday May 31st  from 7-9pm

and

Saturday June 1st from 10am – 4pm

Cost $300 for Level II, class meets twice ($75 for the Reiki Review)


Presented by Lisa Campion

Sometimes called the Master level you will learn the master symbols, receive the master level attunement and learn how to give attunements to others. Reiki Level III will take your Reiki into a whole new level and many people experience great joy and spiritual healing at this level. We will learn advanced healing techniques and have plenty of time to practice attunements on each other. The coolest thing about Reiki III is that you can then attune other people to Reiki and share the love!

I will also be offering a Reiki review.

Can’t remember your Reiki?

Forgot your all your Reiki Symbols?

Or maybe you haven’t practiced all that much…

No worries! We got you covered. You can retake my Reiki class with me for just $75, wow! Brush the dust of your hot hands and lets bust out some Reiki moves so you can carry on healing the world with confidence.

For more information email solsticehealing@yahoo.com or Call 508-533-0669
item.name: Reiki III
